bug.summary: scipy coo can store multigraph, but DGL always assumes scipy coo is a simple graph
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
Here DGL always assumes scipy coo is a simple graph: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dmlc/dgl/blob/master/python/dgl/graph_index.py#L1159>https://github.com/dmlc/dgl/blob/master/python/dgl/graph_index.py#L1159</denchmark-link>
But scipy coo can store a multigraph. import numpy as np from scipy import sparse as spsp
src = np.array([0, 1, 1, 3, 3, 5, 10], dtype=np.int64) dst = np.array([0, 2, 2, 4, 4, 2, 5], dtype=np.int64)
coo = spsp.coo_matrix((np.ones(len(src)), (src, dst))) print(coo.nnz) csr = coo.tocsr() print(csr.nnz) <denchmark-code>coo.nnz=7 csr.nnz=5 </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: actually, this problem has been fixed by this PR: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dmlc/dgl/pull/1357>#1357</denchmark-link>
